name: Night Shift (itch) (NotRobertHarper)
description:
As a freshly recruited intern for a security company. Use the cameras and your trusty Walkie Talkie to guide your veteran partner Grant through the mall on a normal nightly patrol. 

Playtime - 2 mins.

Replay value - None.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Analyse Monitor

Right Mouse Button (Hold) - Walkie Talkie (while held use Left Mouse Button to talk to Grant.)

CREDITS
